revisionDesc.change: added TEI header structure w/o IDs and titles; added minimal TEI markup
pulled transcription from Primary Source Media

body.p: [Walt Whitman referred to Henry Clapp, editor of the Saturday Press, who "wrote more than once to me while I was in Boston, to become the solicitor and medium of pecuniary aid from you to him, to support his paper. Such solicitations I declined to act upon. He then wrote directly to you—and you advanced him $200. I think the money has been well enough invested—The paper has many original . . ."]
